ing: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
des: "This unassuming dip, loaded with shrimp and Italian-style seasonings, is simple to make and hard to resist. It is best served with rippled potato chips. Enjoy!!    "
ins: In a medium bowl, mix sour cream, dry Italian-style salad dressing mix and baby shrimp. Chill in the refrigerator until serving.
